title: Proud Boys, Oath Keepers Face Lawsuit Over Capitol Riot
sub_head: The District of Columbia’s attorney general alleges the groups conspired to attack the Capitol on Jan. 6
body:
WASHINGTON—The District of Columbia sued the Proud Boys and the Oath Keepers, D.C. Attorney General Karl Racine said, alleging the far-right groups conspired to attack the U.S. Capitol on Jan. 6 and disrupt the certification of President Biden’s election victory.
The civil lawsuit, filed Tuesday in federal court in Washington, names the two groups and more than 30 individuals it says are associated with them.
